tool_description: This API is able to store contacts. You can update them as well. Also, if you want to add contacts you can do it.
name: Address-Book-API
title: Address-Book-API

api_list.name: GetAllContacts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://address-book-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/contacts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "address-book-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
